title: moved to live auction: amateur baseball PCs
author: darwinbulldog

posts.post_title: moved to live auction: amateur baseball PCs
posts.post_content:
I have another group of mostly deadball era baseball postcards (and a few photos) available. The first group I offered for $25/ea. or 5 for $100. Let's drop the price a little here. 

[STRIKE]$20/ea. or 6 for $100.[/STRIKE] Currently up for auction on NET54 BST

Let me know if you have any questions.
In case it's not clear, the 3 at the bottom and the 2 above the "Baseball Lovers" postcards are the photographs. Everything else is a postcard.
